articles.title: International Women's Day 2024: “Invest in women—accelerate progress” - World Health Organization (WHO)
articles.description:
By Ms Saima Wazed, WHO Regional Director for South-East Asia

Each year, on March 08, the world marks International Women’s Day (IWD) to renew our collective commitment to achieving gender equality. This year, we are enjoined to “inve…
